decision_conditions:
It is hereby confirmed that the revised wording for condition 2 of planning consent P2021/0969/FUL is as follows:

description:
Non-material amendment to planning application ref: P2021/0969/FUL dated 04/03/2022. The changes involve minor revisions to floorspace areas and the approved accommodation schedule; architectural design changes as part of the detailed design and co-ordination of services; landscaping and infrastructure revisions following discussions with residents; co-ordination of services and
access requirements and improvements to urban greening.
